Adjacent to the living room for a fluid transition. Features a modern dining table with space for family interaction.
Modern kitchen equipped with state-of-the-art appliances. Designed to face east according to Vastu principles for positive energy and optimal functionality.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor. Accessible from the main entrance with modern security features.
